name: Liechtenstein E-Invoicing Forum
bossPosition: Head Indirect Taxes at Hilti Group
goal:
- fostering the deployment of E-invoicing in Liechtenstein for national and international transactions
- cooperation with other national E-invoicing forums and initiatives (e.g. Form Elektronische Rechnung Deutschland (FERD) and SwissDign Forum)
euInitiatives:
- fostering the deployment of E-invoicing in Liechtenstein for national and international transactions
- cooperation with other national E-invoicing forums and initiatives (e.g. Form Elektronische Rechnung Deutschland (FERD) and SwissDign Forum)
